mapper.select: SELECT ask_boards.id, ask_boards.title, users.user_id, to_char(created, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as created FROM ask_boards, users WHERE ask_boards.author=users.id ORDER BY grono DESC, grpord ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ask_boards(id, author, title, content, created, grono) VALUES (seq_ask_pk.nextval, #{author}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, seq_ask_pk.nextval )
INSERT INTO ask_boards(id, author, title, content, created, grono, grpord, depth) VALUES (seq_ask_pk.nextval, #{author}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{grono}, #{grpord}+1, #{depth}+1 )
